title: SyntaxError: a declaration in the head of a for-of loop can't have an initializer
summary: The JavaScript exception "a declaration in the head of a for-of loop can't have an initializer" occurs when the head of a for...of loop contains an initializer expression such as for (const i = 0 of iterable). This is not allowed in for-of loops.
short_title: SyntaxError: a declaration in the head of a for-of loop can't have an initializer

parents.title: SyntaxError: a declaration in the head of a for-of loop can't have an initializer
